## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.sql`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                 | Description                   | Default value |
|--------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| SQL_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| SQL_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
